title: WW2 gunner's son welcomes recovery of crashed bomber
description: Gunner Sgt Leonard Shrubsall's son Richard thought his father's plane had been lost over the sea.

title: The daring nun who hid and saved 83 Jewish children
description: A convent in southern France secretly gave sanctuary to 83 Jewish children during World War Two.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: The 'moonshine weddings' breaking Bradford's lockdown
description: Weddings held in back gardens and restaurants are one of many ways the local lockdown is being violated.

title: Kazuyoshi Miura: A professional footballer at 53 - how he does it
description: Kazuyoshi Miura began his career in Brazil in the 1980s - and it still has not ended.

title: Armed guards provided for threatened lesbian couple
description: Their love story made headlines as they fought to get protection from their own families.

title: Romanian tourists swamp village loved by Prince Charles
description: Residents say Viscri, where Prince Charles owns a home, is struggling with a recent tourism boom.

title: The people who die alone with no one to mourn them
description: A specialist team pieces together the life stories of people who die with no next of kin and no will.

title: 'Super bacteria' survives for three years outside space station
description: Scientists who attached a strain of bacteria to the outside of the International Space Station have been stunned to find it survived for three years, in open space.

title: David Bailey creates his own street art with new exhibition of paintings
description: Iconic photographer David Bailey is all about "thinking outside the box" for a new exhibition of his "unseen" oil paintings.

title: Covid recovered patients volunteer in Israeli hospital
description: A hospital in Jerusalem is recruiting recovered Covid-19 patients to visit people who would otherwise be in isolation.

title: Beirut blast: Victims remembered in vigil one month on
description: It is one month since a port explosion caused devastation in Lebanon's capital city.

title: Scotland game in Czech Republic on, says Uefa
description: The Scottish FA says it has received "categorical assurance" Monday's game in the Czech Republic will go ahead.

title: Extinction Rebellion protesters block newspaper printing presses
description: Seventy-two people are arrested in the protest targeting printing presses owned by Rupert Murdoch.

title: Tony Abbott keen to contribute 'expertise' to UK trade role
description: The ex-Australian PM says he is "only too keen" to help the UK, after criticism of his appointment.

title: Coronavirus: 'Critical moment' as students return to university
description: Figures show the number of newly detected coronavirus infections is highest among young adults.

title: Coronavirus: Civil servants 'must get back to offices quickly'
description: The government tells Whitehall bosses to get more staff to come in, but unions say this focus is wrong.

title: Coronavirus: Arrests at Australia anti-lockdown protests
description: In Melbourne, the centre of the outbreak, 300 people marched in defiance of tough restrictions.

title: Coronavirus: House party concerns amid rise in cases
description: Last weekend seven £10,000 fines were handed out to the organisers of illegal raves in Leeds.

title: Allan: Everton sign Brazilian midfielder for £21m from Napoli on three-year deal
description: Everton sign Brazilian midfielder from Napoli on a three-year contract for a fee believed to be around £21.7m.

title: Beirut explosion: Hopes fade in search for survivor
description: Rescue workers are searching for a third day but with no sign of a person beneath the rubble.

title: Rangers goalie Allan McGregor's car set on fire
description: The vehicle belonging to goalkeeper Allan McGregor was deliberately set on fire whilst parked on his driveway.

title: Blossoms bar closed for 'blatantly disregarding' social distancing
description: Capacity levels at the venue had been "continually exceeded" according to the council.

title: Alexei Navalny: Trump refuses to condemn Russia over poisoning
description: The US president says what happened is "tragic", but says he has not seen proof of poisoning.

title: Coronavirus: Tests 'could be picking up dead virus'
description: Scientists say a positive coronavirus result does not guarantee that someone is infectious.

title: Trump panned over reports he called US war dead 'losers'
description: A magazine claims the president called US soldiers killed in action "losers", something he denies.

title: Quiz: How well do you know the road?
description: The highway code is being revised - how well do you know the changes?

title: ‘I hope my blood can help others with coronavirus’
description: In March 2020, Johnny McLarnon was rushed to hospital after being diagnosed with coronavirus.

title: Classic Vauxhall models go on display in Luton exhibition
description: Vehicles from more than 100 years of production go on show in the town where they were made.
